title: Spiga City
author: Spiga City
content: SPIGA CITYSite | Twitter | Telegram | InstagramHi!My name is Maks, I am a representative of the Spiga City team that is developing the NFT project.Spiga City is an upcoming NFT game based on the Play To Earn model. A virtual city of skyscrapers in which retail space in the form of NFTs will be sold, which can be: sold, rented out, created your own business on them and for this you will receive an SPI gaming token. Depending on the unique characteristics of a particular NFT, the return in tokens will be approximately 50% to 1000% APR.Now the team is working on writing WhitePaper, roadmap and tokinomics of the project. In the near future, this information will be published on our website and our social networks, where you can learn more about the project. Also, at the same time, our designers are working on the creation of the NFT collection.The release of the project is scheduled for 2023.At the moment, the first round of Airdrop and PreSeed Sale is taking place on the spiga.city website, some of the tokens from these rounds will immediately go to your Metamask wallet, they can be sold after TGE or exchanged for in-game NFTs, which will soon be released. The value of NFTs will be much higher.General information about Airdrop and PreSeedSale.Airdrop (Round A):Allocated 0.1% tokens (1 000 000 SPI ) ~ 1700 usersIn this round, a participant can only claim 400 SPI tokens once ( ~ 20$ at the price of the IDO round ($0.05))100 SPI will be immediately sent to your Metamask wallet300 SPI will be credited to the account balance. Unlock balance: Cliff: - 6 months, Vesting: - 12 monthsFor each referral, an additional 100 SPI is credited to the balance of each participant (ref code will be displayed after the claim tokens on the site)Obligatory subscription to twitter and telegram, accounts will be checked before vesting‼️ Claim (Airdrop) is subject to the standard BSC blockchain transaction fee of approximately $0.40 (~ 40 cents) in BNB.PreSeedSale Round:Allocated 0.5% tokens (5,000,000 SPI)1 SPI = $0.01Initial Unlock: - 5%Cliff: - 6 monthsVesting: - 12 monthsThis sale will continue until the team finishes work on WhitePaper and publishes it on the site or sells off all the tokens allocated for this sale (whichever comes first).We also recommend subscribing to all social networks of the project, in the future promo codes for free Claim will appear randomly in different posts: SPI tokens, NFTs or WL.Total supply: 1 000 000 000 SPIBlockchain: Binance Smart Chain (BSC)Address: 0x0F1c9Be2f66aEfe54C3A73da4f082d9Ed18AAB5CSite | Twitter | Telegram | Instagram
